mapper.sql: DM, AHZ, YJFL, CBTS, PYM, TYBZ, REMARK
mapper.select: select c1.dm DM, AHZ, YJFL, CBTS, PYM,c1.tybz TYBZ,c1.remark REMARK ,c2.mc YJFLMS ,c3.mc CBTSMS from C_AHZ c1 left outer join c_ajuan_yjfl c2 on c1.yjfl=c2.dm left outer join c_jgdm c3 on c1.cbts=c3.dm order by c1.dm asc

select c1.dm DM, AHZ, YJFL, CBTS, PYM,c1.tybz TYBZ,c1.remark REMARK ,c2.mc YJFLMS ,c3.mc CBTSMS from C_AHZ c1 left outer join c_ajuan_yjfl c2 on c1.yjfl=c2.dm left outer join c_jgdm c3 on c1.cbts=c3.dm
c1.dm=#{dm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select distinct REGEXP_SUBSTR(ah, '[^)]+å­—') ahz from j_jz minus select ahz from c_ahz
select dm,mc from c_jgdm t where length(dm) = 4 order by dm
select to_number(substr(max(a1.dm), 8, 3)) from c_ahz a1 where a1.dm like ( select yjfl || cbts || '%' from c_ahz a2 where a1.dm = a2.dm ) and a1.yjfl = '005' and a1.cbts = '0202'
